page.title: 18KIRKBY STEPHEN SILVER BAND
page.content: The{Kirkby Stephen Silver Band}was formed about 1820.Miss R. Parkinson grandfather founded the Silver band. Today there are 18 players.The{oldest player is{Alf Ward}who is{86}years old and has been playing 80 years.The {youngest}player is{John Cairns}who is {11}years old and has been playing nearly 3 years.{Keith Orrell}is the {conducter}and also a music teacher at the Kirkby Stephen Grammar School.He is the conducter for the Choral Society as well.Ernest Harvy is the secretary this year and Frank Jackson is bandmaster.In a{band contest}at {Hawes}Auction Mart in May Kirkby Stephen Siver band did their best ever in that contest when they came 3rd.The year before they were 4th.The band gives{concerts}and in{churches}and other places and recently played in many{Swaledale vilages.
